message.content:
cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CY

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of digital technologies for language documentation and description, which falls under the field of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also addresses issues related to data management, preservation, and access, which are relevant to digital libraries (cs.DL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper's focus on best practices and recommendations for creating portable resources may also be of interest to researchers in machine learning (cs.LG) and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
